name: Fletcher
description:
https://globalstats.io/leaderboard/61afb3065f5e88a62b8b45c9

Collect the keys to escape the labyrinth, but watch out for enemies on the way!

This game is for the FBLA Game Development and Simulation Competition.

Planned Features:

  • Tutorial
  • Boss Fight
  • Music

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrows to move.
  • Space to drop a key.
  • Shift to shoot a projectile.

Currently known bugs:

  • Unable to submit a second score without having refreshed before beginning your second playthrough.
  • Enemies can get caught on corners
